flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
某个钓鱼人经过１０个小时的
奋战才最终将其钓获，
它的存在也终于被确认。

とある　釣り師が　１０時間の
ファイトの　末に　釣り上げて
存在が　確認　された。

After a 10-hour struggle, a fisherman was able
to pull one up and confirm its existence.

L’esistenza di questo Pokémon è stata scoperta
da un pescatore che ha faticato 10 ore prima
di riuscire a pescarlo.

La existencia de este Pokémon fue confirmada
por un pescador que batalló durante más de
diez horas hasta que consiguió apresar a uno.

Seine Existenz konnte endlich nachgewiesen
werden, nachdem es einem Angler gelang, es
nach einem zehnstündigen Kampf zu fangen.

La première preuve de l’existence de ce
Pokémon est due à un pêcheur ayant bataillé
10 heures pour le tirer hors de l’eau.

某個釣手經過１０個小時的奮戰，
最後才成功將牠釣上來，
而牠的存在也終於被證實。

어떤 낚시꾼이 10시간의
싸움 끝에 낚아 올려
존재가 확인되었다.

とある　つりしが　１０じかんの
ファイトの　すえに　つりあげて
そんざいが　かくにん　された。

ミニリュウが　脱皮を　繰り返して　いるのは
体の　中で　生命の　エネルギーが
どんどん　膨ら 　抑えきれなく　なるからだ。

Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so
because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach
uncontrollable levels.

Dratini fa la muta cambiando continuamente la pelle vecchia,
perché l’energia vitale del suo corpo aumenta fino a
raggiungere livelli incontrollabili.

Dratini muda y se despoja de la vieja piel continuamente. Es
algo que necesita hacer porque la energía que tiene en su
interior no para de alcanzar niveles incontrolables.

Dratini häutet sich ständig, da die Lebensenergie in
seinem Körper stetig und unkontrollierbar ansteigt.

Minidraco mue constamment, renouvelant sans arrêt sa peau.
En effet, l’énergie vitale de son corps augmente régulièrement
et sa mue lui permet d’éviter d’atteindre des niveaux
incontrôlables.

미뇽이 탈피를 반복하는 것은
몸속에서 생명 에너지가 점점 부풀어
올라 억제할 수 없게 되기 때문이다.

ミニリュウが　だっぴを　くりかえして　いるのは
からだの　なかで　せいめいの　エネルギーが
どんどん　ふくら 　おさえきれなく　なるからだ。

ミニリュウが　脱皮を　繰り返して　いるのは
体の　中で　生命の　エネルギーが
どんどん　膨ら 　抑えきれなく　なるからだ。

Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so
because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach
uncontrollable levels.

Dratini fa la muta cambiando continuamente la pelle vecchia,
perché l’energia vitale del suo corpo aumenta fino a
raggiungere livelli incontrollabili.

Dratini muda y se despoja de la vieja piel continuamente. Es
algo que necesita hacer porque la energía que tiene en su
interior no para de alcanzar niveles incontrolables.

Dratini häutet sich ständig und entledigt sich so
seiner Haut, da die Lebensenergie in seinem Körper
stetig und unkontrollierbar ansteigt.

Minidraco mue constamment, renouvelant sans arrêt sa peau.
En effet, l’énergie vitale de son corps augmente régulièrement
et sa mue lui permet d’éviter d’atteindre des niveaux
incontrôlables.

미뇽이 탈피를 반복하는 것은
몸속에서 생명 에너지가 점점 부풀어
올라 억제할 수 없게 되기 때문이다.

ミニリュウが　だっぴを　くりかえして　いるのは
からだの　なかで　せいめいの　エネルギーが
どんどん　ふくら 　おさえきれなく　なるからだ。

脱皮を　繰り返しては
どんどん　大きくなる
生命力　あふれる　ポケモン。

This Pokémon is full of life energy. It continually
sheds its skin and grows steadily larger.

Un Pokémon pieno di energia vitale. Cambia la pelle
per diventare sempre più grande.

Este Pokémon está lleno de vida. Muda su piel
continuamente y crece cada vez más.

Dieses Pokémon strotzt vor Lebensenergie.
Es häutet sich ständig und wird dadurch größer.

Ce Pokémon est plein de vitalité. Il mue et grandit très
régulièrement.

탈피를 반복하면
점점 크게 자라게 되는
생명력 넘치는 포켓몬이다.

だっぴを　くりかえしては
どんどん　おおきくなる
せいめいりょく　あふれる　ポケモン。

目撃者が　少ないために
幻のポケモンと　呼ばれていた。
脱皮した　皮が　見つかっている。

It is called the “Mirage Pokémon” because so few
have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.

Detto “Pokémon miraggio” perché è stato avvistato
da pochi. È facile trovare la sua pelle della muta.

Se le llama el Pokémon Espejismo porque son muy
pocos los que lo han visto. Se encontró su muda.

Man nennt es „Illusion-Pokémon“, denn nur wenige
haben es gesehen. Nur seine Haut wurde oft
gefunden.

On l’appelle « Pokémon mirage » en raison de sa
rareté. On a découvert sa mue.

목격자가 적기 때문에
환상의 포켓몬이라고 불리고 있다.
탈피한 껍질이 발견되고 있다.

もくげきしゃが　すくないために
まぼろしのポケモンと　よばれていた。
だっぴした　かわが　みつかっている。

It is called the “Mirage Pokémon”
because so few have seen it.
Its shed skin has been found.

It is called the “Mirage Pokémon”
because so few have seen it.
Its shed skin has been found.

en raison de sa rareté. On a
découvert sa mue.

It is called the “Mirage Pokémon”
because so few have seen it.
Its shed skin has been found.

On l’appelle “Pokémon mirage”
en raison de sa rareté. On a
découvert sa mue.

This Pokémon is full of life energy.
It continually sheds its skin and
grows steadily larger.

It is born large to start with.
It repeatedly sheds its skin as it
steadily grows longer.

It is called the “Mirage Pokémon”
because so few have seen it.
Its shed skin has been found.

It is called the “Mirage Pokémon”
because so few have seen it.
Its shed skin has been found.

It is called the “Mirage Pokémon”
because so few have seen it.
Its shed skin has been found.

Long considered a mythical POKéMON until
recently, when a small colony was found
living underwater.

Even the young can exceed 6.5 feet in
length. It grows larger by repeatedly
shedding skin.

A DRATINI continually molts and sloughs
off its old skin. It does so because the
life energy within its body steadily builds
to reach uncontrollable levels.

DRATINI continually molts and sloughs
off its old skin.
It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach
uncontrollable levels.

DRATINI continually molts and sloughs
off its old skin.
It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach
uncontrollable levels.

It sheds many lay­
ers of skin as it
grows larger. Dur­ ing this process,
it is protected by
a rapid waterfall.

This POKéMON is
full of life ener­
gy. It continually sheds its skin and
grows steadily
larger.

It is born large
to start with. It
repeatedly sheds its skin as it
steadily grows
longer.

The existence of
this mythical
POKéMON was only recently confirmed
by a fisherman
who caught one.

Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.

Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.
